thread.title_full: Axminster Tools & Machinery reviewed by Andrew Buchanan

author: Andrew Buchanan
title: Andrew Buchanan
text:
Great product range and keen pricing. First class service and quick delivery. Super packaging and 1-2 day delivery for Â£1 - not bad!
I would order again without hesitation and feel that I can honestly recommend Axminster Tools & Machinery to others. An A1+++ company!
